SchedulingAdherenceSummary.name: SchedulingAdherenceSummary
SchedulingAdherenceSummary.description: Represents daily shift adherence data for a service resource in a service territory and job profile on a specific date.

AdherencePercentage.description: Percentage of time that the agent was present during the scheduled shift time.

ConformancePercentage.description: Percentage of time when the agent was present versus the duration of scheduled shifts. The time that the agent is present can extend beyond the scheduled shift.

Date.description: Date for which the adherence data is calculated.

JobProfileId.description: The ID of the job profile.

JobProfileName.description: The name of the job profile.

Name.description: A number that identifies this summary record.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the schedule adherence summary.

ServiceResourceId.description: The ID of the service resource.

ServiceResourceName.description: The name of the service resource.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: The ID of the service territory.

ServiceTerritoryName.description: The name of the service territory.

TotalAdherenceMinutes.description: Total minutes that the agent was present during a shift.

TotalInteractionMinutes.description: Total minutes that the agent was actively receiving work.

TotalPresenceMinutes.description: Total minutes of agent presence time.

TotalScheduledMinutes.description: Total minutes of scheduled shift time for the agent.

TotalShrinkageMinutes.description: Total minutes that the agent was present but not receiving work, such as break times.

SchedulingAdherenceSummary.accessRules: a Workforce Engagement license, and both Workforce Engagement and Omni-Channel must be enabled
